sense.def:
To preserve a situation or condition
pomeni poskrbeti, da položaj ali stanje ostane tako, kot je.

seg.quote: We are interested in preserving world peace.
I stood there, determined to preserve my dignity.

sense.def:
To preserve something
pomeni ukrepati, da bi nekaj rešili ali obvarovali.

seg.quote: ...a big house which had been preserved as a museum.

sense.def:
To preserve food
pomeni predelati hrano tako, da se ne pokvari.

seg.quote: Deep freezing is the simplest way of preserving food.

sense.def:
Preserves
je vrsta hrane, na primer marmelada ali čatni, ki jo pripravimo tako, da sadje ali zelenjavo kuhamo s sladkorjem, zato da se ne bi pokvarila.
